  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectiveGeometric

      public ObjectiveGeometric(String description, int points, Map<Coordinates,Artifacts> objectivePattern)
      Default Constructor.
      Defines objective description, number of points held and the required Geometric pattern.
      Parameters:
      description - String description of the Model.Objectives.Objective.
      points - Int number of points held by the objective.
      objectivePattern - Map with key Model.Utility.Coordinates of the pattern and value resource/color of the pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getObjectivePattern

      public Map<Coordinates,Artifacts> getObjectivePattern()
      Retrieves the objective pattern associated with this object.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are coordinates and values are artifacts representing the pattern or layout of objectives.

    • countPoints

      Method to calculate the amount of points given to the player at the end of the game.
      Specified by:
      countPoints in class Objective
      Parameters:
      cardMap - CardMap associated to the player.
      Returns:
      int number of points.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. Two ObjectiveGeometric objects are considered equal if they satisfy the following conditions: - They are the same instance (reference equality). - They belong to the same class. - They have the same super class equality. - They have the same objectivePattern.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Objective
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare this ObjectiveGeometric instance with.
      Returns:
      true if the given object is equal to this ObjectiveGeometric object, false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code value for the ObjectiveGeometric object. The hash code is computed based on the hash code of its superclass and the objectivePattern attribute.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Objective
      Returns:
      A hash code value for this ObjectiveGeometric object.
